name: 0.15-lib
body:
_**What is new on this minor release:**_

*Bug fixes*
- Continue execution on unknown telnet commands.

name: 0.14-lib
body:
_**What is new on this minor release:**_

- Add support for summary reply field and read partition.
- Add support for circular fields
- Screen positions change dynamically depending on screen size

*Bug fixes*
- APL Charset improvement
- Index out of bound when running M5 type

name: 0.13-lib
body:
_**What is new on this minor release:**_
 - Multiple connection listeners support
   > Now it's possible to add multiple connection listeners in order to be notified when a connection event occurs.
 - Fix position count when sending spaces as input
   > Spaces sent with input are now counted as input data, therefore impacting in cursor position.
 - APL charset support
   > [Apl charset](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/zvm/7.2?topic=devices-apl-character-support) is a special charset used to pretty format tables and lines on screens.
 - Fix some concurrent issues caused by screen refresh

name: 0.12.4-lib
body:
_**What is new on this patch release:**_
 - Fix using always default terminal size. 
   > Support alternative screen size when present.
 - Fix issue when sending data by a label. Error when formating screen.
   > Screen text lineal position aligned with field positions. Input by label improved.
 - Add support for APL charset

name: 0.12.3-lib
body:
**_What is new in this patch release:_**
- Modification of the method `setTabulatedInput` in order to actually replicate the behaviour that a terminal emulator does when pressing tabulator key.

name: 0.12.2-lib
body:
This patch version comes with: 

- Support for extended fields without field attributes

name: 0.12.1-lib
body: - This patch version includes the fix of a concurrent exception faced.

name: 0.12-lib
body: - Method added in `TerminalClient` in order to set text by a specified amount of tabulators.

name: 0.11.1-lib
body:
- Fix bug originated in version 0.11 which could not allow user to insert empty inputs.
- Additionally, we have fixed support for input by label and handling of PA1, PA2 and PA3 attention keys for SSCP LU session screens.

name: 0.11-lib
body: This release includes the great contribution by @CharlesDUBOIS allowing to select the charset to be used on terminal client. Additionally, we have fixed support for input by label SSCP LU session screens.

name: 0.10-lib
body:
This release includes changes due to repository transfer but also many bug fixes and improvements:
- Include null chars when returning fields to allow to properly differentiate between space and null and avoid sending nulls as spaces to server.
- Move cursor to next field (as is usually done on emulators) when a field text is set and the field is filled (all characters are set).
- Properly handle case when no field is modified and enter is pressed, which was previously sending to mainframe application some arbitrary text from screen.
- Properly handle building screens on non extended protocols to avoid fields wrapping around screen when screen is incomplete (there are positions not covered by fields).
- Fix generation of extended command headers counter which was not properly increasing on replies.

name: 0.9.1-lib
body: Fixes `TerminalClient` initialization for proper handling of alternate screen dimensions for different terminal types

name: 0.9-lib
body:
This release allows to add listeners to `TerminalClient` before invoking `connect` and allows to be notified when connection has been established.

**Breaking Changes**:
 - `TerminalClient` constructor now requires `model` and `screenDimensions` parameters, and the associated setters have been removed
 - `ExceptionHandler` has been renamed to `ConnectionListener` and a new operation `onConnection` has been added to the interface to notify when a connection is established.

name: 0.8.1-lib
body: Fix mockito testing dependency scope and upgrade mockito to latest version.

name: 0.8-lib
body: Add to TerminalClient a method to be able to retrieve all metada for screen through getFields method.

name: 0.7-lib
body:
This version adds:
- method to allow setting field text by specifying the label identifying the field
- support for Sscp-lu-data transmission to enhanced protocol support
- send protected modified fields to server when mainframe application sends and expected such fields
- fix screen contents resolution hiding invisible fields
- fix handling of newline characters sent by mainframe applications
- additional enhanced protocol fixes (BID command, reason/operation function and packets with just headers)

name: 0.6-lib
body: Some 3270 applications do not return any fields on screen and expect the user to send an input. The library has been changed to be able to handle such situations and allow through TerminalClient.setFieldText sending such input.

name: 0.5.1-lib
body: DatatypeConverter (jaxb) is no longer included in Java 9, so as to support Java 9 we have removed such dependency.

name: 0.5-lib
body: First release of -lib artifact from original dm3270 code
